p: The yield of crude methanol extract was 6.00%. The result of phytochemical analyses of the methanol stembark extract of L. sericeus, as presented in Table 1, revealed that the extract contained alkaloids, saponins, cardiac glycosides, flavonoids terpenes and tannins. Anthraquinones and phlobatannins were not found. Quantitative determinations of some bioactive constituents ( Table 2), showed a higher flavonoid content compared to alkaloids and saponins.
